name: Bahia - Blu - U700
additionalNotes: Bahia Blu cigars are handmade in Estel√≠, Nicaragua, from an oily Corojo wrapper leaf over an aged amalgam of Nicaraguan long-fillers. Tasting notes of cedar, toast, and leather layer the palate with hints of red pepper before a long and succulent finish. Bahia Blu delivers a mild to medium-bodied profile in a collection of traditional sizes packaged in ultra-affordable 20-count bundles.
